overview: Jeannie S. Johnston is the Founder and CEO of Paralegal Gateway, Inc. (a/k/a ParalegalGateway.com). Jeannie has more than 20 years of business and web development experience at an Executive level. Additionally, Jeannie has been a Paralegal for more than 19 years, a Speaker at National Paralegal Conferences, Legal Sales Executive and Legal Staffing Consultant. Jeannie serves as the Director of The National Association of Virtual Bankruptcy Assistants, is a Member of the Advisory Board for the Paralegal program at Athens Technical College, and is a Member of Paralegal Todayâ€™s Editorial Advisory Board. She is a legal career expert featured on the Atlanta Edition of The Examiner and has written articles for Paralegal Today as well as The Paralegal Reporter.
